trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_SEQ_00<tab>A peculiar crystal lies on the Capitol's polished floor.
TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_TODO_00<tab>Examine the crystals.
TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_TODO_01<tab>Search for crystals.
TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_TODO_02<tab>Search for more crystals.
TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_TODO_03<tab>Search for yet more crystals.
TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_TODO_04<tab>Search for yet still more crystals.
TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_TODO_05<tab>Examine the crystal.
TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_TODO_06<tab>Speak with Y'shtola.
TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_SYSTEM_000_000<tab>A peculiar crystal lies on the floor. Upon its surface, an array of lights twinkle like a tiny constellation of stars...
TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_REDCRYSTAL_000_001<tab>(-Crimson Crystal-)<var 48 F20223 /var>...day forth...bring honor to the seat of...<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_SYSTEM_000_002<tab>The distorted voice of an ancient rings out in your mind. A moment preserved in the crystal, it would seem.
TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_SYSTEM_000_003<tab>You notice something else glinting up ahead.
TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>You find three more crystals lying on the floor. Though they differ in color and decoration, each is identical in shape.
TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>You focus on the crystals, and find that the words they hold ring clearer than before.
TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_YELLOWCRYSTAL_000_012<tab>(-Yellow Crystal-)<var 48 F20223 /var>Behold, my friends.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_YELLOWCRYSTAL_000_013<tab>(-Yellow Crystal-)<var 48 F20223 /var>Embraced by the earth and caressed by the wind, vibrant life flourishes. All is right in creation.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_GREENCRYSTAL_000_014<tab>(-Green Crystal-)<var 48 F20223 /var>There can be no greater joy than to use our wisdom for the good of our people. No greater pride.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_GRAYCRYSTAL_000_015<tab>(-Grey Crystal-)<var 48 F20223 /var>May all know happiness, now and forevermore.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_SYSTEM_000_016<tab>There do not appear to be any more crystals in the hall. Perhaps it would be wise to continue the search outside.
TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_SYSTEM_000_020<tab>Your instincts serve you true, and you discover another two crystals.
TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_SYSTEM_000_021<tab>As you reach out with your consciousness, new voices begin to echo in your mind...

TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_SEAGREENCRYSTAL_000_022<tab>(-Pale Green Crystal-)<var 48 F20223 /var>The heavens are ablaze and the land rent asunder. What will become of the world? Is life itself to be denied?<var 48 01 /var>

TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_PURPLECRYSTAL_000_023<tab>(-Purple Crystal-)<var 48 F20223 /var>Come what may, we must not surrender to despair. If we but hold fast to hope, we may yet find a path to salvation.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_SYSTEM_000_024<tab>The voices tell an incomplete tale. Might more remain to be found?
TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_SYSTEM_000_030<tab>You soon discover two more crystals. Rather <var 1A 02 /var>too<var 1A 01 /var> soon, in fact, as if someone wanted you to find them...

TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_NAVYCRYSTAL_000_031<tab>(-Blue Crystal-)<var 48 F20223 /var>Everything burns. Crumbles. Decays. I hear the lamentations of my brethren. And soon there will be only silence.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_PEACOCKGREENCRYSTAL_000_032<tab>(-Turquoise Crystal-)<var 48 F20223 /var>We will deliver our star from its doom, this we swear. So please, dry your tears.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_SYSTEM_000_033<tab>Whatever awaits at the end of your search, it is plain you have yet to find it.
TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_SYSTEM_000_040<tab>Sure enough, your persistence is swiftly rewarded, this time with three crystals.
TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_SKYBLUECRYSTAL_000_041<tab>(-Sky Blue Crystal-)<var 48 F20223 /var>The time is come. We shall rewrite the laws of creation. And we shall save our star.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_COLORLESSCRYSTAL_000_042<tab>(-Colorless Crystal-)<var 48 F20223 /var>From this life, our savior born... May I be worthy of the honor.<var 48 01 /var>

TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_PINKCRYSTAL_000_043<tab>(-Pink Crystal-)<var 48 F20223 /var>I feel my soul turning. Slowly but irrevocably. And the power I wield begins to seem terrible... But this is right. It is right.
TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_SYSTEM_000_044<tab>The tale the crystals weave seems to near its end, but it isn't over yet...
TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_SYSTEM_000_050<tab>With almost melancholy inevitability, the twelfth crystal soon reveals itself to your questing eye.
TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_SCARLETCRYSTAL_000_051<tab>(-Scarlet Crystal-)<var 48 F20223 /var>Though salvation is ours, it came at great sacrifice. All that remains is to pray...<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_SCARLETCRYSTAL_000_052<tab>(-Scarlet Crystal-)<var 48 F20223 /var>To pray that we will one day meet again, beneath a blue sky.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_SYSTEM_000_053<tab>Judging by its testimony, it would seem the voice was recorded in the wake of the Final Days.
TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_SYSTEM_000_054<tab>As you scan the area, another glint catches your eye.
TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_YSHTOLA_000_060<tab>Ahhh... Fresh air at long last. I would celebrate my return to dry land with a pot of tea─had we the luxury of time.
TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_YSHTOLA_000_061<tab>But we must be prepared for Elidibus. Given what we know, it is plain he will not be deterred from his course.
TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_YSHTOLA_000_062<tab>And nor would I, were I him. Not if it meant forsaking everything I loved.
TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_YSHTOLA_000_063<tab>That said, I have not forgotten how Emet-Selch sought to find common ground with us, for all our misgivings.

TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_YSHTOLA_000_064<tab>Ultimately, our differences were not to be bridged, of course, but one must always try. Emet-Selch understood this, and if his gesture resonated with you, perhaps you might consider reaching out to his brethren.
TEXT_LUCKMI106_03776_YSHTOLA_000_065<tab>Though it may all be for naught, you of all people know that there is no such thing as a foregone conclusion.
